data.title: Business Immigration
data.summary: Business immigration services – Start-Up Visa, PNP Entrepreneur, C11, Self-Employed

hero.title: Business Immigration
hero.subtitle: Empowering Entrepreneurs, Investors & Self-Employed Professionals to Launch and Grow in Canada
hero.body: At TENTACULAR IMMIGRATION SOLUTIONS LTD, we guide ambitious business-minded individuals through Canada's federal and provincial business immigration streams — helping you transition from startup idea to permanent residency, legally and strategically.

programs.title: Start-Up Visa Program
programs.subtitle: For visionary entrepreneurs with innovative business ideas
programs.description: Canada's Start-Up Visa Program is designed for visionary entrepreneurs who have the potential to build innovative businesses in Canada that can compete globally, create jobs for Canadians, and drive long-term economic growth.

requirements.listItem: Letter of Support from designated organization

programs.title: Provincial Entrepreneur Streams
programs.subtitle: Tailored pathways for regional business builders
programs.description: Each province offers entrepreneur streams under the PNP, providing permanent residence pathways to qualified businesspeople ready to invest, settle, and contribute to the local economy.

programs.title: C11 Work Permit
programs.subtitle: Launch or acquire a Canadian business without LMIA
programs.description: The C11 work permit allows entrepreneurs to enter Canada to actively manage their own business, owning at least 50% and demonstrating significant economic benefit to the country.

requirements.listItem: Own at least 50% of a Canadian business

programs.title: Self-Employed Persons Program
programs.subtitle: For cultural professionals, athletes, and artists
programs.description: Direct pathway to permanent residency for individuals with relevant experience in cultural or athletic activities who intend to continue working independently in Canada.

requirements.listItem: Intent to be self-employed in Canada

howItWorks.heading: Our Start-Up Visa Services
howItWorks.text: Submit your business idea to a designated incubator, angel investor group, or venture capital fund. If approved, you'll receive a required Letter of Support.

howItWorks.heading: Meet Language Requirements
howItWorks.text: Achieve CLB 5 in English or French.

howItWorks.heading: Prove Settlement Funds
howItWorks.text: Demonstrate you can support yourself and your dependents in Canada (per IRCC guidelines).

howItWorks.heading: Launch While You Wait
howItWorks.text: Eligible applicants may apply for a temporary work permit to begin operations in Canada while awaiting permanent residence approval.

fees.description: For entrepreneurs joining existing startup groups
fees.note: Private-market fees, not charged by IRCC

fees.description: Business incubators, angel investors, or venture capital funds
fees.note: Varies based on business stage and potential

fees.description: Funding the actual launch of your startup

c11Benefits.title: Create or maintain jobs for Canadians
c11Benefits.description: Demonstrate employment opportunities for local workforce

c11Benefits.title: Introduce innovative goods or services
c11Benefits.description: Bring new technologies or solutions to the Canadian market

c11Benefits.title: Expand regional economic opportunities
c11Benefits.description: Contribute to local economic development and growth

c11Benefits.title: Increase exports or develop international markets
c11Benefits.description: Help Canada expand its global trade relationships

postInvestmentCards.title: Continuous Business Ownership
postInvestmentCards.description: Maintain active ownership or management of your Canadian business

postInvestmentCards.title: Job Creation for Canadians
postInvestmentCards.description: Demonstrate employment opportunities created for Canadian workers
